column1: Despite a secret past in which he pledged allegiance to a powerful Latino gang, Detective Ryan Lopez is now a respected member and rising star of Los Angeles' elite gang task force. When his best friend and partner is slain by an infamous gang member, Ryan teams up with task force member Cassius Green, who has been at the forefront of the war on organized crime. While Ryan is still beholden to gang leader Javier Acosta, he feels an increasing sense of loyalty to his task force as they take aim at dangerous gangs, helping him to determine which side of the law he is really on.
